titles: All gentleman souldiers that will serve under the command of Colonell Edward Massey, Commander in chiefe of the Westerne Association, let them forthwith repaire to the signe of the George in Kings street Westminster, where they shall receive present entertainment.
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
